description: FTP files save all the information about a site added in FlashFXP. The information includes the FTP site name, connection type, address, login type, file transfer rules, username, and password.
You can import an FTP file in FlashFXP by selecting Sites â†’ Import Sites... , choosing the "FlashFXP XML (*ftp)" format from the dropdown menu, navigating to the FTP file, and clicking Import .
